data.actual_result: No picture loads. Wikipedia has an exception to where the title of the embed shows but not the picture
data.expected_result: The picture embedded in the link should show.
data.short_description: Links that contain an embedded picture don't work. Ex. (Imgur, Amazon / Amazon AWS, Pictures from the discord website, Wikipedia,  etc.)
data.steps_to_repro: - Find any picture online or use a screenshotting tool. - get the link of said image (right click \~ copy image adress, or the screenshotting tool should automatically copy it to your clipboard) - paste said link into discord.
